content: *this pattern is part of the hobbii x pica pau advent 2025 calendar* **size** one size **measurements** height approx 28 cm / 11 ears not included **materials** pica pau cotton 8/7 1 skein of color 06 portobello 1 skein of color 10 pale pink 1 skein of color 22 honey rainbow 8/4 glitter gold 1 skein of color 20 petrol green gold materials from first character in the advent 2025 calendar pica pau cotton 8/7 nude leftover of color 03 buttermilk pica pau cotton 8/7 leftover of color 37 black leftover of color 08 dusty pink crochet hook 2 75 mm / us c2 2 safety eyes 8 mm stuffing tapestry needle stitch marker **yarn quality** pica pau cotton 8/7 nude hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds pica pau cotton 8/7 hobbii 100% cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 90 m 98 yds rainbow 8/4 glitter gold hobbii 95% cotton 5% polyester 50 g 1 75 oz = 155 m 169 yds **gauge** 10 stitches = 4 cm / 1 5 measured horizontally in one round to make the stitches more tight use the x shaped single_crochet yarn under **pattern information** aurora deer is an intermediate project worked in a continuous spiral to keep track of the rounds you may use a stitch marker or safety pin to mark the beginning of a round the head and the body are worked in a single piece aurora deer also has 4 accessories a skirt a cardigan a pair of boots and a shawl remember that it s always advisable to give the entire pattern a read before starting crocheting and most importantly be patient with yourself **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french
